short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to add notes/todos based on URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add notes/todos in domain/URL environment. Revisit the same note list when back to that URL or access all the notes from the Homepage. No Login/Signup. All the notes are stored in the browser memory.
